definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

sentences.english: China and Africa have long-lasting political instability, several mutinies and coups.
sentences.chinese: 中非政局曾長期持續動盪，多次發生兵變和政變。

sentences.english: Fourth, to set up China-Africa Women Training and Exchanging Centers.
sentences.chinese: 四是建立中非婦女培訓與交流中心。

sentences.english: It is totally unreasonable to make irresponsible accusations against China-Africa energy cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 對中非能源合作妄加指責是毫無道理的。

sentences.english: Such opinions not only contradict historical facts but also harm China-Africa relations.
sentences.chinese: 這些議論既不符合歷史事實，也損害中非關係。

sentences.english: Foreign Minister Yang: China-Africa cooperation has entered a stage of sound development.
sentences.chinese: 中非合作現在進入了一個良好的發展階段。

sentences.english: FOCAC is an effective mechanism for China-Africa practical cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 論壇是中非開展務實合作的有效機制。

sentences.english: The president's stranglehold on power has given the Central African country a certain stability.
sentences.chinese: 他緊抓總統大權使這個中非國家相當穩定。

sentences.english: The Recurrence for a Class of Non-nearest-neighbor Random Walks in Random Environments.
sentences.chinese: 一類隨機環境中非緊鄰的隨機遊動的常返性。

sentences.english: Aneuploidy in human population is a serious genetic problem.
sentences.chinese: 在人類羣體中非整倍性是個嚴重的遺傳問題。

sentences.english: The FOCAC was officially established in 2000.
The China-Africa trade volume has exceeded 100 billion U.S. dollars for the first time in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 2008年中非貿易額首次突破1000億美元。

sentences.english: We study the nonclassical electronic wave packet in quantized electromagnetic Field.
sentences.chinese: 文中研究了量子化電磁場中非經典電子波包的運動。

sentences.english: Monkeypox occurs primarily in remote villages in Central and West Africa, near tropical rainforests.
sentences.chinese: 猴痘主要在中非和西非靠近熱帶雨林的邊遠村莊發生。

sentences.english: The Chinese government stands ready to make joint efforts with its counterpart of the Central African Republic towards that end.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府願與中非政府爲此共同作出努力。

sentences.english: Under the flag of FOCAC, China-Africa friendship has flourished.
sentences.chinese: 論壇是引領中非友好的旗幟。

sentences.english: The minimum number of non-alphabetic characters in a password.
sentences.chinese: 密碼中非字母數字字符的最小數目。

definition: Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]

pinyin: Sa1 ha1 la1 yi3 nan2 Fei1 zhou1
